notes.tokenType: Configure the token type (systemId and unitId) for minting
notes.coinId: The coin identifier used in token data (e.g., 'solana-test', 'bitcoin-test')
notes.nostrRelay: WebSocket URL of the Nostr relay for P2P messaging
notes.aggregatorUrl: URL of the Unicity aggregator service
notes.faucetPrivateKey: Private key for the faucet (secp256k1 32-byte hex). Keep this secure!
notes.defaultAmount: Default token amount if not specified via CLI
